DescriptionData.Title: Strutter's Complete Guide to Clown Makeup - Roberts
DescriptionData.Description: Strutter's Complete Guide to Clown Makeup is a definitive clown makeup manual. Describes the different types of clown faces and helps you design your own unique clown face tailored to your features. Includes detailed stop-by-step directions for applying makeup and tips on powdering, rubber and putty noses, dealing with eyeglasses, handling common makeup problems, and proper makeup selection and removal. 96-page, photo paperback.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Details various clown face paintings and offers tips to create your own
Step-by step directions for application and removal of makeup, props, and noses
Essential tips for clowns and entertainers of all levels
